Sec. 8A-117. Hindering or obstructing officer; penalties.
Any person who shall hinder or obstruct in any way the Director or an inspector in the performance of his official duties shall be guilty of a violation of this article and upon conviction thereof shall be punished by a fine of not less than twenty dollars ($20.00) nor more than two hundred dollars ($200.00) or by imprisonment in the County Jail for not more than sixty (60) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment in the discretion of the court of appropriate jurisdiction.
